resources.string: Hi! my name is Manuela Flores and I live in Lima-Perú, Here is my email: fmanuela499@gmail.com and my twitter: \@manuflowers
“Your limitation it\'s only your imagination”\n - Unknown
“The way get started is to quit talking and begin doing.” \n - Walt Disney
“You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.” \n - C.S. Lewis
“Reading is to the mind, as exercise is to the body.” \n -Brian Tracy
“You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.” \n - Zig Ziglar
“Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.” \n - Lolly Daskal
“Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.”\n - Truman Capote
“If you can dream it, you can do it.”\n - Walt Disney
“Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.”\n - Unknown
